# Bru-Hart Industries

## About
Bru-Hart Industries is a wholesale fencing and gate distributor specializing in high-security gate systems, crash-rated barriers, and access control solutions for critical infrastructure. With over 45 years of experience, we partner with industry-leading manufacturers to provide security solutions for data centers, airports, utilities, government facilities, and more.

## Products
- Commercial & Residential Gates
- Crash-Rated & Tested Gates
- Bollards & Barriers
- Perimeter & Security Fencing
- Access Control Systems
- Custom CNC-Milled Track Systems (Made in USA)

## Industries Served
Data Centers, Airports, Utilities, Government, Ports & Logistics, Corporate
